definition.procedurexml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="timer">timer</variable><variable type="Number" id="absorption_limit">absorption_limit</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="191" y="144"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><comment pinned="false" h="68" w="403">Treat energy costs differently for Glass Armor, since the full set must be worn to cost energy.</comment><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">EnergyVialActiveArmorPieces</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="procedure_retval_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">IsWearingGlassArmorFullSet</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:effect_energy_cost</field><value name="VAL"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">GlassArmorEnergyCost</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:effect_energy_cost</field><value name="VAL"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">CalculateEffectEnergyCost</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="68" w="194">if energy vial is inactive, set timer to 0.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">EnergyVialActive</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="90" w="243">Every 5 seconds, apply the effects and reset timer to 5s.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:effect_energy_timer</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:effect_energy_timer</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="100" w="344">only give effect if:
- There is enough energy in the vial
- The player has an effect energy cost > 0

OR if player is in creative mode</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">energy</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:effect_energy_cost</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_iscreative"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">don't use up energy in creative mode</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_iscreative"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="item_nbt_num_set" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">subtract energy cost from current energy level.</comment><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">energy</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_dual_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">MAX</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">ensure the energy value doesn't go below 0.</comment><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">energy</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:effect_energy_cost</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">helmet_active</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">ApplyHelmetEffect</field></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">chestplate_active</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">ApplyChestplateEffect</field></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">leggings_active</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">ApplyLeggingsEffect</field></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">boots_active</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">ApplyBootsEffect</field></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="procedure_retval_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">IsWearingGlassArmorFullSet</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">helmet_active</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">chestplate_active</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">leggings_active</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">boots_active</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">GlassArmorProcedure</field></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:effect_energy_timer</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:effect_energy_timer</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:effect_energy_timer</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
